title: Bucket-List Croatian Island Getaway with Complimentary Room Upgrade, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description: Experience the beautiful Croatian island of Korcula with a getaway at Port 9 Resort. Dubbed “Little Dubrovnik” thanks to its medieval squares and churches, Korcula is the perfect way to experience Croatia without the crowds. Enjoy a complimentary upgrade to a Superior Room, daily breakfast, nightly dinner and a bottle of wine on arrival for two. Travelling with family? Choose the Family Upgrade option with full package inclusions for two adults and two children (aged 11 and under).
